titles.title: Freedom to Haul Act
Freedom to Haul Act
To amend title 23, United States Code, with respect to vehicle weight limitations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Freedom to Haul Act
This bill exempts from federal-aid highway vehicle weight limitations a five-axle truck tractor-semitrailer combination vehicle operating on a segment of the Interstate System if it:
has a gross vehicle weight of 97,000 pounds or less; has three rear axles on the tractor of such vehicle; and complies with the single axle, tandem axle, and bridge formula limits.
